cbinstall.name: CB ProfileBook
cbinstall.author: JoomlaJoe and Beat
cbinstall.description: Provides each registered user with there own Guestbook like system.

param.name: pbStatRating
param.label: Add Rating to Stats List
param.description: Adds the average user profile rating to the users stats section

param.name: pbStatRatingText
param.label: Stats Menu Label
param.description: Label to be used to show stats menu

param.name: pbEntriesPerPage
param.label: Entries per Page
param.description: Number of entries shown per page.

param.name: pbSortDirection
param.label: Sort Order
param.description: Set the sort order of entries on a profile based on submission date/time.

param.name: pbAllowAnony
param.label: Anonymous Entries
param.description: Allow unregistered users to write entries.

param.name: pbAllowSmiles
param.label: Allow Smilies
param.description: Allow users add smilies to their post

param.name: pbAllowBBCode
param.label: Allow BBCode
param.description: Allow users to add bbcode to their post

param.name: pbPagingEngabbled
param.label: Enable Paging
param.description: Allow entries to automatically page when they exceed the number per page limit.

param.name: pbEnableGesture
param.label: Enable Gesture
param.description: When a user is viewing an entry from another registered user a link will appear that will allow them to return the gesture.

param.name: pbUseLocation
param.label: Use Location Field
param.description: Allow posters to enter a location as part of their entry

param.name: pbLocationField
param.label: Location Field
param.description: Select the name of the field which contains the equivalent field in the Community Build Field manager. If blank, registered users will be asked for a location.

param.name: pbUseWebAddress
param.label: Use Web Address Field
param.description: Allow posters to enter a web address as part of their entry

param.name: pbWebField
param.label: Web Address Field
param.description: Select the name of the field which contains the equivalent field in the Community Build Field manager. If blank, registered users will be asked for a web address.

queries.query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `#__comprofiler_plug_profilebook` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `posterid` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `posterip` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `postername` varchar(255) default '', `posteremail` varchar(255) default NULL, `posterlocation` varchar(255) default NULL, `posterurl` varchar(255) default NULL, `postervote` int(11) unsigned default NULL, `postercomment` text NOT NULL, `date` datetime default NULL, `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `feedback` text, `editdate` datetime default NULL, `editedbyid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `editedbyname` varchar(255) default NULL, `published` tinyint(3) NOT NULL default '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) TYPE=MyISAM
